job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Job Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Location: Pune
This role will be responsible for the Process Automation Machine Learning new technology implementation working with project teams — defining the defining the problem statement and building solutions, sourcing them from other internal teams or external options. Following are the additional responsibilities –
Deep understanding of machine learning capabilitiesNew technology implementation in process automation
Build and maintain reusable components and utilities as common serviceSupport / manage the design and development of technology and process solutions to meet the agreed business requirements including management information requirements and mitigation of risks (via appropriate controls / reconciliations) within the technology / process solutionsCreate and work in an agile environment.
Stakeholder Management and Leadership skills
Must be able to work with global (UK, India and US) and multi-disciplinary (3rd party, contractors and Barclays) delivery teams.
What will you be doing?
The Role Holder Will Possess The Following
Responsible for the successful delivery of projects along with delivery teams
Deliver innovative solutions on timely manner and within budget
Contribute ideas and suggestions for process improvements within the project and across the group.
Ability to work in global environment with people from diverse cultural backgrounds
Delivers strategies for Colleague Process automation, improvement and opportunities for consolidation
Displays ability to reach decisions under conditions of uncertainty or high risk
Candidate Profile
Excellent written and verbal English language skills
Experience Process automation tools, Workflow/Machine Learning automation technologies.
Ability to quickly learn new technology, business domains and processes
Proven ability to multi-task, be flexible and work hard, both independently and in a team environment, in a high pressured environment with changing priorities
Willingness to work outside of normal business hours
Good team player and self-motivated
Adaptable and able to pick up new techniques
High attention to detail and quality of work
Able to create clear technical specifications from business
What We’re Looking For
Technical expertise in new technologies such as ML, NLP and AI
Python expert
Excellent communication skills (oral and written) with senior stakeholders, business subject matter experts, IT staff
Experience of working to tight deadlines in a fast moving environment
Pragmatic rather than idealistic outlook
Track record of high-quality delivery
Wide range of proven analytical ability
Use of Microsoft office products - primarily Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Microsoft Project, Visio, Blue Works Live
Strong analytical and problem solving abilities.
Skills That Will Help You In The Role
Strong Project Management skills
Decision making capabilities
Stakeholders management
Development experience on Blueprism/UI Path preferred
Where will you be working?
Chennai
